turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Wild Arms.
turn.1: What is the story of Wild Arms' Flower Thieves?
turn.2: Flower Thieves" takes place thousands of years after a war between humans and demons destroyed much of the life on the planet, turning the world into a scorched wasteland.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Set in a dystopian future, the manga features a large group of humans on their last legs, living in the overcrowded city of Upper Hose where flowers and other flora are rare and valuable.
turn.5: What happen with the Flower Thieves?
turn.6: When a plant-eating monster known as a "Flower Thief" attacks a mysterious girl named Jechika, a young boy, Maxi, must use a forbidden ARM weapon to save her, and is subsequently expelled from the city for using illegal technology.
turn.8: Traveling into the wilderness with Jechika and a florist named Gi, Maxi sets off on a quest to restore the balance of nature throughout the world and make the earth habitable again.
turn.9: Did it have any more sequels?
turn.10: Beginning with "Wild Arms 2" in 1999, official adaptations of each "Wild Arms" game were produced by such manga companies as DNA Media, Enix, Bros.
turn.12: Comics, GanGan Wing, and 4Kings for release exclusively in Japan.
